title: Equation of electric field as function of position

content.question: The figure above represents the electric field E as a function of position x due to a particular radio wave at time t = 0 s. Which of the following equations correctly describes the electric field?

topic.text: 14.1: Properties of Wave Pulses and Waves

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
